First release - A collection of messagedefintions for use in three different IGs. Acknowledgement 2.0, CareCommunication 5.0 and HomeCareObservation 1.1

title: MessageDefinition IG of the MedCom Message profiles
introduction: The MessageDefinition IG contains the collection of all MedCom MessageDefinitions inherited from MedComMessagingMessageDefinitionFHIR related to specific MedCom FHIR messaging standards.
